phrs.translation: 撤消认可, 否定代表资格, 撤除承认

sentences.sentence: Violation of this policy will result in adverse action by the SEI, which may include decertification or de-authorization of the Lead Appraiser and termination of CMMI Partner licenses.
sentences.translation: 违反这项政策将导致SEI采取相应的处罚措施，可能包括取消主任评估师的授权或认证资质，和终止CMMI合作伙伴的授权许可。
